# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, we're extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $100. We're confident it will exceed your expectations and deliver the results you're looking for. Please let us know if you're interested in taking advantage of this opportunity. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
